enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Issues relating to Protocol Articles 7 and 8
sentences: This issue was first addressed by SBSTA in Plenary on Wednesday, 16 June.

Informal consultations were co-facilitated by Helen Plume (New Zealand) and Branca Americano (Brazil), in conjunction with informal consultations on issues relating to greenhouse gas inventories (see previous section).
On Friday, 25 June, Parties adopted SBSTA conclusions containing draft COP and COP/MOP decisions.

Commenting on this issue, the EU noted the importance of access to all necessary information by expert review teams undertaking annual reviews of greenhouse gas inventories, including information deemed confidential by Parties, while the US stressed the importance of protecting confidential information.
